key.name: multihead-mode
key.description: Should the notification position follow the mouse-focus or not in multi-screen environments. Use values "dont-focus-follow" or "focus-follow".

key.name: gravity
key.description: Position of notifications on screen. Supported values are 1 (top-right) and 2 (vert. centered on the right).

key.name: close-on-click
key.description: Close notification by clicking on it.

key.name: fade-on-hover
key.description: Fade notification bubble when cursor is hovering over it.

key.name: action-ignore
key.description: List of applications to advertise support for actions (buttons) to.

key.name: ignore-session-idle-inhibited
key.summary: Show notifications with system idle inhibited
key.description: Show notifications even if an application is inhibiting system idle.
